column9: # This is a potential format of the question Bank.
# There are 20 chapters, and 5 question types.
# For a given chapter, question type, there can be any number of questions (in my example, I have filled random 3 questions, but there can be as many as 20-30 .
# This can be done via SQL, where each q has the following attributes: Chapter No, Q type, Question ID,
# the advantage of this taxonomy will be that all the qs can be easily indexed and worksheets can be created.

column3: Derive conditions for escape veloty and find it
State the Keplers Law and derive
Derive the gravitational constant from Newtons Law
